sentences.english: The Four Masterworks by Tang Xianzu drew materials from the novels of the Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: “临川四梦”直接或间接地取材于唐代小说。

sentences.english: The third chapter discusses the evolvement condition of the satirical consciousness of "Linchuan Four Dreams".
sentences.chinese: 第三章，论述“临川四梦”讽世意识演变情形。

sentences.english: The culture of Linchuan has a long history of far-reaching influence.
sentences.chinese: 临川文化历史悠久，影响深远。

sentences.english: The content of Linchuan Simeng (Four Dreams at Lachuan) is originated directly or indirectly from the contents of Tang Dynasty legendary novels.
sentences.chinese: “临川四梦”直接或间接地取材于唐代小说。
